sandhanaya wenuwen moratu pradeshaye mudal wiyadam kala ekama manthriwaraya thaman bawath an kisiwek pakshaya wenuwen rupiyalakwath wiyadam kara nomathi bawath 2008 warshayedi jiwan kumarathunga amathiwarayage karyalaya janathawa kada damu awasthawe pawa thamange pudgalika mudalwalin ema karyalaya pilisakara kara dun bawath ki hethema amathiwaraya hata dan ema athithaya amathaka bawath kiya sitiyeya.
